member.name: M:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Core.Platform.UWP.C1ViewRenderer`2.MeasureOverride(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, measures the size in layout required for child elements and determines a size for the FrameworkElement-derived class.
member.param: The available size that this element can give to child elements. Infinity can be specified as a value to indicate that the element will size to whatever content is available.
member.returns: The size that this element determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of child element sizes.
